TopicTitle: How do I angle my landing struts?

Articles.Content: Trying to position them at a 45 drgree angle, I saw it done on a video but do not know how he did it. THank you for your assistance
When placing an object in the VAB, you can use W,A,S,D,Q,E to rotate the items. If you want to do a finer rotation, hold shift while pressing W,A,S,D,Q, or E
Hold Shift and use WASDQE keys to accurately position it how you like.
